docs.title: Chapter 1 - Foundations of Physical AI
docs.description: Welcome to the exciting world of Physical Artificial Intelligence (Physical AI)! In this chapter, we'll explore how artificial intelligence moves from abstract algorithms and digital systems to tangible, physical manifestations. We'll establish the fundamental concepts that distinguish Physical AI from traditional digital AI and introduce you to the fascinating realm of embodied intelligence.

frontMatter.title: Chapter 1 - Foundations of Physical AI

docs.title: Chapter 2 - The Robotic Nervous System (ROS 2)
docs.description: In Chapter 1, we explored the fundamental concepts of Physical AI and embodied intelligence. Now we dive into the practical infrastructure that enables these concepts to come to life: the Robot Operating System 2, or ROS 2. Just as our biological nervous system coordinates our body's responses, ROS 2 serves as the nervous system for modern robots, orchestrating communication between sensors, actuators, and control systems.

frontMatter.title: Chapter 2 - The Robotic Nervous System (ROS 2)

docs.title: Chapter 3 - Digital Twins and Simulation
docs.description: Welcome to Chapter 3, where we explore how digital twins and simulation enable the safe, efficient, and iterative development of Physical AI systems. Just as architects create digital models before building physical structures, roboticists use digital twins and simulation to test and refine AI algorithms before deploying them on real robots.

frontMatter.title: Chapter 3 - Digital Twins and Simulation

next.title: Chapter 4 - The AI Brain with NVIDIA Isaac

docs.title: Chapter 4 - The AI Brain with NVIDIA Isaac
docs.description: Welcome to Chapter 4, where we explore how the "AI brain" powers humanoid robots. Just as the human brain coordinates thoughts, perceptions, and actions, the AI brain in a robot integrates perception, planning, and control to create intelligent behavior. This chapter introduces NVIDIA Isaac, a powerful platform that provides the computational foundation for these AI systems.

frontMatter.title: Chapter 4 - The AI Brain with NVIDIA Isaac
frontMatter.sidebar_label: Chapter 4 - The AI Brain with NVIDIA Isaac
